name: NIGHTSHIFTERZ
description:
NIGHTSHIFTERZ is a zombie apocalypse RPG where you have to deliver fish curry and pizza to the rich survivors in their bunkers!

You play as YOU, but your are dressed as FINLEY, the mascot of FINLEY'S FISH FOOD. (They make a mean prawn curry.) You will have to successfully complete all the tasks your manager gives you at each location if you hope to survive and save your fellow FINLEY'S who are being held hostage at the restaurant and in the delivery truck with you.

YOU CAN DO IT FINLEY!
